title: Pioneer Agronomy Insights: Enlist and the Importance of Pre-Emerge Herbicides

tasks.task: Gather information about pre-emergent herbicide use
subtasks: Listen to field agronomist Larry Lunder's presentation
Understand the importance of incorporating pre-emergent herbicides into weed control programs
Learn about the potential issues with relying solely on post-emergent herbicides
Recognize the benefits of adding pre-emergent herbicides for controlling resistant weeds
Understand how pre-emergent herbicides can extend the effectiveness of post-emergent herbicides
Identify examples of herbicides resistant to current management practices
Consider the role of judicious herbicide use in maintaining their effectiveness over time
Note the demonstration of pre-emergent technologies in Pioneer's executive plots
Plan to attend tour dates in July to view the demonstrations

tasks.task: Reflect on cleaner fields enhancing yield potential
subtasks: Acknowledge the concluding thought about cleaner fields leading to bigger yields
Contemplate the relationship between weed control and crop yield
